# [`noquote()`]{.blue}
 
 
### [noquote]{.blue}(*text*){.center} 
 
# What it does 

+ The [`print()`]{.blue} function prints without quotes.  [`noquote()`]{.blue} function prints without quotes.
  
 
# Demo code 

```{r eval=TRUE}
noquote('The cyberman said "error."')
```
  
 
# Usefull stuff 

+ This is similar to [`paste`]{.blue}(*text*, `quote = FALSE)` but if you save a `noquote` object it will remember the object should not be quoted.
